players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night and he's a threat to us all."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso and we need to lynch him, he's a threat to all of us."
Diana: "Bob is not the mafioso, we can't lynch him. We need to discuss more and figure out who the real mafioso is."
